page.title: 08HEALTH
page.content: The area in general is very poorly served by the health authority. Within the 12 square kilometers of the block there is{only one doctor's {surgery. }This surgery is in Lower Brynamman. It is served by one doctor only. The only addition to this service is a{rota system}which operates at{weekends and evenings aided by doctors from neighbouring areas. There is no dentist or optician practising within the block though there are surgeries in the neighbouring towns. The villages within the block are served by a{district nurse and {midwife.
